Detailed Description

This file contains the prototypes of the APIs present in the device abstraction layer file of CRC. This also contains some related macros.

Macro Definition Documentation

#define CRC_CHANNEL_IRQSTATUS_RAW_MAIN_ALL
Value:
(uint32_t) ((uint32_t)CRC_INTS_CH1_CCITENS_MASK | \
(uint32_t)CRC_INTR_CH1_FAILENR_MASK | \
(uint32_t)CRC_INTR_CH1_OVERENR_MASK | \
(uint32_t)CRC_INTR_CH1_UNDERENR_MASK | \
(uint32_t)CRC_INTR_CH1_TIME_OUT_ENR_MASK)

Macro defines mask for all the interrupts for a channel.

CRC programming sequence:

  1. CRCChannelReset()
  2. CRCInitialize()
  1. CRCConfigure()
  2. CRCEnableIntr() - if needed
  3. Transfer data to PSA signature for generation of signature value
    • DMA is utilized in Semi-CPU mode
    • CPU need to pump data into PSA register in Full CPU mode.
  4. CRCGetPSASectorSig()
    • After complete transfer read CRC signature. CRC signature generated depends on amount of data copied into PSA register at a time/in single write. Though data pattern can be 8, 16, 32, or 64 bit, data copied into PSA register is always 64 bit wide. If data pattern is less than 64 bit, then it is padded with zeros to make it 64 bit write.

Typedef Documentation

typedef enum crcIntrPriority crcIntrPriority_t

Enum to define the offset for the highest priority interrupt.

These interrupt offset returned CRCGetHighestPriorityIntrStatus function

typedef enum crcOperationMode crcOperationMode_t

Enum to select the CRC Operation Mode.

CRC can either operate in Semi-CPU or Full-CPU. Refer to CRC Modes Overview.

Enumeration Type Documentation

enum crcChannel

Enum to select the CRC Channel.

Enumerator
CRC_CHANNEL_1 

Select channel 1 for operation

CRC_CHANNEL_2 

Select channel 2 for operation

CRC_CHANNEL_3 

Select channel 3 for operation

CRC_CHANNEL_4 

Select channel 4 for operation

enum crcIntrPriority

Enum to define the offset for the highest priority interrupt.

These interrupt offset returned CRCGetHighestPriorityIntrStatus function

Enumerator
CRC_INTR_PRIORITY_CH1_COMPRESSION_DONE 

Offset return for channel 1 compression done interrupt

CRC_INTR_PRIORITY_CH2_COMPRESSION_DONE 

Offset return for channel 2 compression done interrupt

CRC_INTR_PRIORITY_CH3_COMPRESSION_DONE 

Offset return for channel 3 compression done interrupt

CRC_INTR_PRIORITY_CH4_COMPRESSION_DONE 

Offset return for channel 4 compression done interrupt

CRC_INTR_PRIORITY_CH1_OVERRUN 

Offset return for channel 1 overrun interrupt

CRC_INTR_PRIORITY_CH2_OVERRUN 

Offset return for channel 2 overrun interrupt

CRC_INTR_PRIORITY_CH3_OVERRUN 

Offset return for channel 3 overrun interrupt

CRC_INTR_PRIORITY_CH4_OVERRUN 

Offset return for channel 4 overrun interrupt

CRC_INTR_PRIORITY_CH1_TIMEOUT 

Offset return for channel 1 timeout interrupt

CRC_INTR_PRIORITY_CH2_TIMEOUT 

Offset return for channel 2 timeout interrupt

CRC_INTR_PRIORITY_CH3_TIMEOUT 

Offset return for channel 3 timeout interrupt

CRC_INTR_PRIORITY_CH4_TIMEOUT 

Offset return for channel 4 timeout interrupt

enum crcOperationMode

Enum to select the CRC Operation Mode.

CRC can either operate in Semi-CPU or Full-CPU. Refer to CRC Modes Overview.

Enumerator
CRC_OPERATION_MODE_SEMICPU 

Configure CRC operation mode to Semi-CPU

CRC_OPERATION_MODE_FULLCPU 

Configure CRC operation mode to Full-CPU

uint32_t  channel 
)

This API is used to reset the channel.

Parameters
baseAddrBase Address of the CRC Registers.
channelChannel number for which reset is to be done. Values given by enum crcChannel_t.
Returns
None

int32_t CRCConfigure ( uint32_t  baseAddr,
uint32_t  channel,
uint32_t  crcPatternCount,
uint32_t  crcSectorCount,
uint32_t  crcMode 
)

This API will configure CRC mode, pattern and sector count for given channel.

Parameters
baseAddrBase Address of the CRC Registers.
channelChannel number to be initialized. Values given by enum crcChannel_t.
crcPatternCountIt is used to check if DMA does supply a block of data responding to a request in a given time frame.
crcSectorCountIt is used to check if DMA does supply a block of data responding to a request in a given time frame.
crcModeCRC operational mode. Refer enum crcOperationMode_t.
Returns
status CRC configuration status

void CRCGetPSASectorSig ( uint32_t  baseAddr,
uint32_t  channel,
crcSignature_t *  crcSectorSign 
)

This API is used to get Sector Signature Value/ CRC value for given data.

Parameters
baseAddrBase Address of the CRC Registers.
channelChannel number which was configured for CRC calculation. Values given by enum crcChannel_t.
crcSectorSignRefer struct crcSignature_t.
Returns
None
Note
This API should be called after complete transfer of sector/data to PSA register.
